translated: have made the owl their king.
If I am approved by the relatives,
“Speak, my friend, if you are approved,
the meaning and the Dhamma in full;
For there are young birds here
who are wise and have great splendor.”
“I do not approve of your good fortune,
Look at the face of the one who is not angry,

analyzed: katham kuddhaḥ karissati iti  ulūka jātakam dasama  paduma vaggo dutiyaḥ
translated: how will the angry one act?”🔽The Owl Birth Story is the tenth.
The second group, the Lotus Group, is finished.🔽The summary:🔽Lotus, supreme, elephant, king, and splendor,
with ocean, sacrificial post, and best of hooves;
Then good fortune, monkey, elephant, tree, and again,
harsh speech, and the owl, the ten.
